PageSize.description: 当前分页包含多少条目。

Status.description:
镜像状态：
* Missing
* Available
* Creating
* UnAvailable
* CreateFailed

Progress.description: 镜像完成的进度，单位为百分比。

ProductCode.description:
产品代码。  
如果返回该参数，则表示该镜像是基于镜像市场的镜像制作而成。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "PageSize": 20,
  "RequestId": "XXXX-XXXX",
  "PageNumber": 1,
  "TotalCount": 1,
  "Images": [
    {
      "Status": "Available",
      "ImageType": "system",
      "Progress": "100%",
      "Size": 40,
      "CreateTime": "Mon May 27 13:33:42 CST 2019",
      "Name": "windows 2016 标准版 citrix 1903",
      "ImageId": "m-bp125mb261tmk6tqvoni",
      "ProductCode": "cmjj00042097"
    }
  ]
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<TotalCount>1</TotalCount>

<PageNumber>1</PageNumber>
<Images>

    <Progress>100%</Progress>

    <Size>40</Size>
    <CreateTime>Mon May 27 13:33:42 CST 2019</CreateTime>
    <ImageId>m-bp125mb261tmk6tqvoni</ImageId>
    <ImageType>system</ImageType>
    <Name>windows 2016 标准版 citrix 1903</Name>
</Images>","errorExample":""}]
title: 获取镜像信息列表
